name: Bottom-right crimes
description:
This game is a project for #NoShitSherlockJam2018. 

· To play:

- Use WASD keys.

- Space keyboard to interact with elements. 

· Cases used: 

- The secret of the abandoned museum

- The mysterious criminal consultant

- And then there was one

· Team members:

- Juan @_WhoOne_ (programmer)

- Sara @MujerMarmota (artist)

- Marina @Ninfa_dp (game designer, music composer)

- Azul @BluemeansAzul (the mysterious criminal consultant)
